name: Banana Lunacy
description:
The world must be saved from evil bannas and spin bears. The banana boss wants to take over the world. You must stop him!

Throw enchanted boxes at your enemies to defeat them!

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse 1 - Throw Default Box
  • Mouse - Camera Movement
  • 1-3 - Throw Enchanted Box
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • ESC - Pause Game
Credits

This game including all assets apart from 1 smoke FX was made for the KrassJam 13 by Benjamin Nilsson. This also means that features had to be cut such as sound.

Known Bugs
  • Mouse sensitivity resets when the game restarts (restart ingame, not a physical restart of the game)
  • Camera clipping through literally everything :D
  • Bananas clipping through the gate
  • Player can ride bananas and get over obstacles they should not, use this as you wish. Any% speedrun?
  • Game sometimes crashes after restarting it several times
